title.rendered: Early Dismissal for Grades K-8 on Tuesday, June 24

content.rendered:
Due to the heat advisory, the district has decided to dismiss middle and elementary school students early on Tuesday, June 24 

Maple Avenue Middle School students will be dismissed at 11:45 a.m., and lunch will be served before dismissal. The 8th grade moving-up ceremonies will proceed as scheduled. 

Elementary School students will be dismissed at 12:45 p.m., and lunch will be served before dismissal. There will be no after-school programs, including the YMCA BASE Program.   

Saratoga Springs High School will hold Regents Exams as scheduled in air-conditioned spaces. Transportation will be provided as scheduled. 

Please note: Wednesday, June 25, is the last day of school for grades K-8 and will still be a half day as scheduled. The middle school will dismiss at 10:30 a.m., and all elementary schools will dismiss at 11:47 a.m. 

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation as we prioritize the safety of our students and staff.
